text: "Fat Bottomed Girls" is a 1978 song by Queen and taken from their seventh studio album Jazz. It was a double A-side to Bicycle Race and went to number 7 in France, the Netherlands and Norway, number 10 in Ireland, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 17 in Canada, number 20 in New Zealand and number 24 in the United States. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Fat Bottomed Girls
